parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description:
The language used in the **LocalName** parameter. Valid values:

*   **zh-cn**: Chinese
*   **en-us**: English
*   **ja**: Japanese

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the zone. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
